summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IXA Digital agency website. Backend APIs working correctly with 87.5% success rate. Frontend functionality fully operational including contact form submission, admin authentication, dashboard management, and protected routes. Minor issues identified with WhatsApp button visibility and HTTP status code consistency.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: WhatsApp button not visible during testing despite component being implemented
ui_bugs.note: Component has 2-second delay and may need debugging for visibility

passed_tests: Admin submission status updates (read, contacted, closed)
Admin login page and authentication flow
Admin dashboard with stats cards and submissions list
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Investigate WhatsApp button visibility issue - component exists but may not be rendering properly. 2. Optional: Update unauthorized access endpoint to return 401 instead of 403 for consistency.
